admin.add_items_subcategory: 🗂️ Please enter the subcategory name or "cancel": Example: Subcategory#1
admin.add_items_category: 🗂️ Please enter the category name or "cancel": Example: Category#1
admin.add_items_json_msg:
📄 Send a .json file with new items or enter "cancel" to cancel. Example file content: 
[
  {
    "category": "Category#1",
    "subcategory": "Subcategory#1",
    "price": 50,
    "description": "Mocked description",
    "private_data": "Mocked private data"
  },
  {
    "category": "Category#2",
    "subcategory": "Subcategory#2",
    "price": 100,
    "description": "Mocked description",
    "private_data": "Mocked private data"
  }
]
admin.add_items_price: 💵 Please enter the price in {currency_text} or "cancel": Example: 50.0
admin.add_items_private_data: ℹ️ Please send the data the user will receive after purchase. Note: If you enter one line, one product is added; if you enter multiple lines, multiple products are added. 1 line = 1 item 10 lines = 10 items. If you want to cancel adding items, enter "cancel".
admin.add_items_txt_msg:
📄 Send a .txt file with new items or enter "cancel" to cancel. Example file content: 
CATEGORY#1;SUBCATEGORY#1;DESCRIPTION#1;50.0;PRIVATE_DATA#1
CATEGORY#1;SUBCATEGORY#1;DESCRIPTION#1;50.0;PRIVATE_DATA#2
CATEGORY#1;SUBCATEGORY#1;DESCRIPTION#1;50.0;PRIVATE_DATA#3
CATEGORY#1;SUBCATEGORY#1;DESCRIPTION#1;50.0;PRIVATE_DATA#4
CATEGORY#1;SUBCATEGORY#1;DESCRIPTION#1;50.0;PRIVATE_DATA#5
CATEGORY#1;SUBCATEGORY#1;DESCRIPTION#1;50.0;PRIVATE_DATA#6
CATEGORY#1;SUBCATEGORY#1;DESCRIPTION#1;50.0;PRIVATE_DATA#7
CATEGORY#1;SUBCATEGORY#1;DESCRIPTION#1;50.0;PRIVATE_DATA#8
admin.choose_crypto_to_withdraw:
🚫 Cryptocurrency withdrawals are only available in the paid version!
Contact @ilyarolf_dev to purchase.
admin.credit_management_added_success: ✅ Successfully added {amount} {currency_text} to the user with Telegram ID: {telegram_id}.
admin.credit_management_minus_operation: ➖ Enter the value to reduce the user's balance in {currency_text}.
admin.credit_management_plus_operation: ➕ Enter the value to increase the user's balance in {currency_text}.
admin.credit_management_reduced_success: ✅ Successfully deducted {amount} {currency_text} from the user with Telegram ID: {telegram_id}.
admin.credit_management_request_user_entity: 👤 Enter the user's Telegram ID or username:
admin.credit_management_user_not_found: ⚠️ User with this data was not found in the database.
admin.delete_entity_confirmation: ❓ Do you really want to delete {entity} named {entity_name}?
admin.new_users_msg: 👥 {users_count} new users in the last {timedelta} days:
admin.notification_new_deposit_id: 💰 New deposit from user ID {telegram_id} of {currency_sym}{deposit_amount_usd} with
admin.notification_new_deposit_username: 💰 New deposit from user @{username} of {currency_sym}{deposit_amount_usd} with
admin.notification_purchase_with_tgid: 🛒 A new purchase by user @{username} of {currency_sym}{total_price} for {quantity} units of {category_name} {subcategory_name}.
admin.notification_purchase_with_username: 🛒 A new purchase by user ID:{telegram_id} of {currency_sym}{total_price} for {quantity} units of {category_name} {subcategory_name}.
admin.refund_confirmation_by_tgid: ❓ Do you really want to refund {currency_sym}{total_price} to user ID:{telegram_id} for purchasing {quantity} {subcategory}?
admin.refund_confirmation_by_username: ❓ Do you really want to refund {currency_sym}{total_price} to user @{telegram_username} for purchasing {quantity} {subcategory}?
